Package pl.polsl.model

Class PremiumUser

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.model.PremiumUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
User
public class PremiumUser extends Object implements User
Represents a premium user in the application.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Pawel Drzazga

      public ArrayList<Movie> getMovies(Map<SearchCriterion,String> criteria) throws ModelException

      getMovies in interface User
      Parameters:
